items.content_html: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.

It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.

items.content_html: Notably is a lightweight, personalized note-taking web-app designed for efficient task and life management. It serves as a to-do list while offering widgets that provide key updates on inevitable aspects of daily life. With a focus on simplicity and usability, it helps users stay organized and informed in a seamless, intuitive way.

items.content_html: BunPulse is a lightweight, high-performance WebSocket server built on Bun, fully compatible with the Pusher protocol. With BunPulse, you can easily implement real-time communication in your applications, benefiting from blazing-fast performance, scalability, and secure connections with minimal setup.
items.title: stephenjason89/bun-pulse: BunPulse is a lightweight, high-performance WebSocket server built on Bun, fully compatible with the Pusher protocol. With BunPulse, you can easily implement real-time communication in your applications, benefiting from blazing-fast performance, scalability, and secure connections with minimal setup.
